Dear ,

IENSSC is an international academic congress that aims to bring together the Engineering and Natural Sciences students from all over the world.
The Session Chairs and the speakers are undergraduate Engineering Students. The Congress will be held on April 28-29, 2016 at Maltepe University, Istanbul, Turkey.
This year's subject is chosen as "Engineering Technologies". Submitted articles will be reviewed by technical committees of the Faculty of Engineering and Natural Sciences.
All submitted articles should report original, previously unpublished research results, experimental or theoretical, and will be peer-reviewed.
For further information please visit the Congress website http:// ienssc.maltepe.edu.tr
